unnormalised: Arre yaar, these govt schemes for education, like the RTE Act and the PM Poshan Yojana, are actually helpful, no? I remember back in school, some friends wouldn't have been able to study without the free books & mid-day meals. Heard the enrollment rates in govt schools went up by 15% after RTE came in! Though, quality of education still needs improvement, especially in rural areas like my village near Patna. They need more trained teachers and better infrastructure, for sure.
